caption.p: Mutant strains used for the whole cell membrane rigidity measurements

tr.td: Cyclization of squalene to form C30 hopanoids (diploptene and diplopterol)
No hopanoid production and accumulation of squalene
Addition of adenosine to diploptene to generate adenosylhopane, a precursor for extended hopanoid production
No extended hopanoid production, accumulation of C30 hopanoids
Removal of adenine from adenosyl hopane
No BHT and aminoBHT production, accumulation of adenosylhopane
An IM transporter that transports hopanoids to the outer membrane
Absence of hopanoids in the OM and accumulation of hopanoids in the IM
Methyl transfer to A ring at C-2

fn.p: The function of the gene and the effect of its deletion are listed.
